name: Hailstorm Hero
description:
A deadly hailstorm has hit the city, and only you can save the day! Make your way through three levels full of helpless townspeople to rescue. You must carry, move, rotate, and stack the falling iceblocks in order to reach the townspeople, while avoiding being crushed by the iceblocks yourself. Can you save the city before the ice stacks too high and topples over, destroying the whole town?

This game was made in Unity, and is my very first fully-functioning video game.
